thread.section_title: Foodler Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Foodler | foodler.com
thread.title: Nicole Ivey

author: Nicole Ivey
title: Nicole Ivey
text: I am an avid Foodler-ite (sometimes multiple times a week, if it works with my budget). I can only think of one remotely 'negative' experience with Foodler, where there was an order processed & charged on Foodler's end, even through it wasn't processed on the restaurant's end. I was compensated with a full refund, in addition to Foodler bucks, so I really can't even complain about that. I love the variety that is accessible through Foodler. I love that there is a point system/rewards through the use of purchases on Foodler. I love that some restaurants that reward Foodler bucks when you make $100 (doesn't have to be all at once) in purchases with places that you love to eat from anyway. There are just so many perks and benefits with Foodler. I wish that I were a celebrity so that I could endorse Foodler because I seriously love it that much.
